And the second<S>8145</S> lot<S>1486</S> came forth<S>3318</S> to Simeon<S>8095</S>, even for the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Simeon<S>8095</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>: and their inheritance<S>5159</S> was within<S>8432</S> the inheritance<S>5159</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>.
And they had in their inheritance<S>5159</S> Beersheba<S>884</S>, or Sheba<S>7652</S>, and Moladah<S>4137</S>,
And Hazarshual<S>2705</S>, and Balah<S>1088</S>, and Azem<S>6107</S>,
And Eltolad<S>513</S>, and Bethul<S>1329</S>, and Hormah<S>2767</S>,
And Ziklag<S>6860</S>, and Bethmarcaboth<S>1024</S>, and Hazarsusah<S>2701</S>,
And Bethlebaoth<S>1034</S>, and Sharuhen<S>8287</S>; thirteen<S>7969</S> <S>6240</S> cities<S>5892</S> and their villages<S>2691</S>:
Ain<S>5871</S>, Remmon<S>7417</S>, and Ether<S>6281</S>, and Ashan<S>6228</S>; four<S>702</S> cities<S>5892</S> and their villages<S>2691</S>:
And all the villages<S>2691</S> that were round about<S>5439</S> these cities<S>5892</S> to Baalathbeer<S>1192</S>, Ramath<S>7414</S> of the south<S>5045</S>. This is the inheritance<S>5159</S> of the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Simeon<S>8095</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>.
Out of the portion<S>2256</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> was the inheritance<S>5159</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Simeon<S>8095</S>: for the part<S>2506</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> was too much<S>7227</S> for them: therefore the children<S>1121</S> of Simeon<S>8095</S> had their inheritance<S>5157</S> within<S>8432</S> the inheritance<S>5159</S> of them.
And the third<S>7992</S> lot<S>1486</S> came up<S>5927</S> for the children<S>1121</S> of Zebulun<S>2074</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>: and the border<S>1366</S> of their inheritance<S>5159</S> was unto Sarid<S>8301</S>:
And their border<S>1366</S> went up<S>5927</S> toward the sea<S>3220</S>, and Maralah<S>4831</S>, and reached<S>6293</S> to Dabbasheth<S>1708</S>, and reached<S>6293</S> to the river<S>5158</S> that is before<S>6440</S> Jokneam<S>3362</S>;
And turned<S>7725</S> from Sarid<S>8301</S> eastward<S>6924</S> toward the sunrising<S>4217</S> <S>8121</S> unto the border<S>1366</S> of Chislothtabor<S>3696</S>, and then goeth out<S>3318</S> to Daberath<S>1705</S>, and goeth up<S>5927</S> to Japhia<S>3309</S>,
And from thence passeth on along<S>5674</S> on the east<S>4217</S> <S>6924</S> to Gittahhepher<S>1662</S>, to Ittahkazin<S>6278</S>, and goeth out<S>3318</S> to Remmonmethoar<S>7417</S> to Neah<S>5269</S>; <sup>methoar: or, which is drawn</sup>
And the border<S>1366</S> compasseth<S>5437</S> it on the north side<S>6828</S> to Hannathon<S>2615</S>: and the outgoings<S>8444</S> thereof are in the valley<S>1516</S> of Jiphthahel<S>3317</S>:
And Kattath<S>7005</S>, and Nahallal<S>5096</S>, and Shimron<S>8110</S>, and Idalah<S>3030</S>, and Bethlehem<S>1035</S>: twelve<S>8147</S> <S>6240</S> cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>.
This is the inheritance<S>5159</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Zebulun<S>2074</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>, these cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>.
And the fourth<S>7243</S> lot<S>1486</S> came out<S>3318</S> to Issachar<S>3485</S>, for the children<S>1121</S> of Issachar<S>3485</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>.
And their border<S>1366</S> was toward Jezreel<S>3157</S>, and Chesulloth<S>3694</S>, and Shunem<S>7766</S>,
And Hapharaim<S>2663</S>, and Shion<S>7866</S>, and Anaharath<S>588</S>,
And Rabbith<S>7245</S>, and Kishion<S>7191</S>, and Abez<S>77</S>,
And Remeth<S>7432</S>, and Engannim<S>5873</S>, and Enhaddah<S>5876</S>, and Bethpazzez<S>1048</S>;
And the coast<S>1366</S> reacheth<S>6293</S> to Tabor<S>8396</S>, and Shahazimah<S>7831</S>, and Bethshemesh<S>1053</S>; and the outgoings<S>8444</S> of their border<S>1366</S> were at Jordan<S>3383</S>: sixteen<S>8337</S> <S>6240</S> cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>.
This is the inheritance<S>5159</S> of the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Issachar<S>3485</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>, the cities<S>5892</S> and their villages<S>2691</S>.
And the fifth<S>2549</S> lot<S>1486</S> came out<S>3318</S> for the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Asher<S>836</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>.
And their border<S>1366</S> was Helkath<S>2520</S>, and Hali<S>2482</S>, and Beten<S>991</S>, and Achshaph<S>407</S>,
And Alammelech<S>487</S>, and Amad<S>6008</S>, and Misheal<S>4861</S>; and reacheth<S>6293</S> to Carmel<S>3760</S> westward<S>3220</S>, and to Shihorlibnath<S>7884</S>;
And turneth<S>7725</S> toward the sunrising<S>4217</S> <S>8121</S> to Bethdagon<S>1016</S>, and reacheth<S>6293</S> to Zebulun<S>2074</S>, and to the valley<S>1516</S> of Jiphthahel<S>3317</S> toward the north side<S>6828</S> of Bethemek<S>1025</S>, and Neiel<S>5272</S>, and goeth out<S>3318</S> to Cabul<S>3521</S> on the left hand<S>8040</S>,
And Hebron<S>5683</S>, and Rehob<S>7340</S>, and Hammon<S>2540</S>, and Kanah<S>7071</S>, even unto great<S>7227</S> Zidon<S>6721</S>;
And then the coast<S>1366</S> turneth<S>7725</S> to Ramah<S>7414</S>, and to the strong<S>4013</S> city<S>5892</S> Tyre<S>6865</S>; and the coast<S>1366</S> turneth<S>7725</S> to Hosah<S>2621</S>; and the outgoings<S>8444</S> thereof are at the sea<S>3220</S> from the coast<S>2256</S> to Achzib<S>392</S>: <sup>Tyre: Heb. Tzor</sup>
Ummah<S>5981</S> also, and Aphek<S>663</S>, and Rehob<S>7340</S>: twenty<S>6242</S> and two<S>8147</S> cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>.
This is the inheritance<S>5159</S> of the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Asher<S>836</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>, these cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>.
The sixth<S>8345</S> lot<S>1486</S> came out<S>3318</S> to the children<S>1121</S> of Naphtali<S>5321</S>, even for the children<S>1121</S> of Naphtali<S>5321</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>.
And their coast<S>1366</S> was from Heleph<S>2501</S>, from Allon<S>438</S> to Zaanannim<S>6815</S>, and Adami<S>129</S>, Nekeb<S>5346</S>, and Jabneel<S>2995</S>, unto Lakum<S>3946</S>; and the outgoings<S>8444</S> thereof were at Jordan<S>3383</S>:
And then the coast<S>1366</S> turneth<S>7725</S> westward<S>3220</S> to Aznothtabor<S>243</S>, and goeth out<S>3318</S> from thence to Hukkok<S>2712</S>, and reacheth<S>6293</S> to Zebulun<S>2074</S> on the south side<S>5045</S>, and reacheth<S>6293</S> to Asher<S>836</S> on the west side<S>3220</S>, and to Judah<S>3063</S> upon Jordan<S>3383</S> toward the sunrising<S>4217</S> <S>8121</S>.
And the fenced<S>4013</S> cities<S>5892</S> are Ziddim<S>6661</S>, Zer<S>6863</S>, and Hammath<S>2575</S>, Rakkath<S>7557</S>, and Chinnereth<S>3672</S>,
And Adamah<S>128</S>, and Ramah<S>7414</S>, and Hazor<S>2674</S>,
And Kedesh<S>6943</S>, and Edrei<S>154</S>, and Enhazor<S>5877</S>,
And Iron<S>3375</S>, and Migdalel<S>4027</S>, Horem<S>2765</S>, and Bethanath<S>1043</S>, and Bethshemesh<S>1053</S>; nineteen<S>8672</S> <S>6240</S> cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>.
This is the inheritance<S>5159</S> of the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Naphtali<S>5321</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>, the cities<S>5892</S> and their villages<S>2691</S>.
And the seventh<S>7637</S> lot<S>1486</S> came out<S>3318</S> for the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Dan<S>1835</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>.
And the coast<S>1366</S> of their inheritance<S>5159</S> was Zorah<S>6881</S>, and Eshtaol<S>847</S>, and Irshemesh<S>5905</S>,
And Shaalabbin<S>8169</S>, and Ajalon<S>357</S>, and Jethlah<S>3494</S>,
And Elon<S>356</S>, and Thimnathah<S>8553</S>, and Ekron<S>6138</S>,
And Eltekeh<S>514</S>, and Gibbethon<S>1405</S>, and Baalath<S>1191</S>,
And Jehud<S>3055</S>, and Beneberak<S>1139</S>, and Gathrimmon<S>1667</S>,
And Mejarkon<S>4313</S>, and Rakkon<S>7542</S>, with the border<S>1366</S> before<S>4136</S> Japho<S>3305</S>. <sup>before: or, over against</sup> <sup>Japho: or, Joppa</sup>
And the coast<S>1366</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Dan<S>1835</S> went out<S>3318</S> too little for them: therefore the children<S>1121</S> of Dan<S>1835</S> went up<S>5927</S> to fight<S>3898</S> against Leshem<S>3959</S>, and took<S>3920</S> it, and smote<S>5221</S> it with the edge<S>6310</S> of the sword<S>2719</S>, and possessed<S>3423</S> it, and dwelt<S>3427</S> therein, and called<S>7121</S> Leshem<S>3959</S>, Dan<S>1835</S>, after the name<S>8034</S> of Dan<S>1835</S> their father<S>1</S>.
This is the inheritance<S>5159</S> of the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Dan<S>1835</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>, these cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>.
When they had made an end<S>3615</S> of dividing the land<S>776</S> for inheritance<S>5157</S> by their coasts<S>1367</S>, the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> gave<S>5414</S> an inheritance<S>5159</S> to Joshua<S>3091</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Nun<S>5126</S> among<S>8432</S> them:
According to the word<S>6310</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> they gave<S>5414</S> him the city<S>5892</S> which he asked<S>7592</S>, even Timnathserah<S>8556</S> in mount<S>2022</S> Ephraim<S>669</S>: and he built<S>1129</S> the city<S>5892</S>, and dwelt<S>3427</S> therein.
These are the inheritances<S>5159</S>, which Eleazar<S>499</S> the priest<S>3548</S>, and Joshua<S>3091</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Nun<S>5126</S>, and the heads<S>7218</S> of the fathers<S>1</S> of the tribes<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, divided for an inheritance<S>5157</S> by lot<S>1486</S> in Shiloh<S>7887</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, at the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>. So they made an end<S>3615</S> of dividing<S>2505</S> the country<S>776</S>.
